metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0034 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In vp8_decode_frame of decodeframe.c, there is a possible out of boundsread due to improper input validation. This could lead to remoteinformation disclosure if error correction were turned on, with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1Android ID:A-62458770

criterions.comment: libvpx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
